Macronutrient Breakdown

Protein - Builds and repairs muscles, supports immune function
Carbohydrates - Primary energy source for daily activities
Fats - Essential for hormone production and nutrient absorption

Daily Recommendations:

  • Protein: 10-35% of daily calories
  • Carbs: 45-65% of daily calories
  • Fats: 20-35% of daily calories
